blog.name: kimabutch
blog.title: Revolutionary
blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: Something I’ve been thinking of: what do you think it would take for Beau to divulge Caleb’s secret to the rest of the group...
body:
Something I’ve been thinking of: what do you think it would take for Beau to divulge Caleb’s secret to the rest of the group (without his consent)? 

Marisha said last night on Talks that the biggest reason that Beau hasn’t told anyone is that she wants to prove to Caleb and herself that she’s the type of person who can keep that secret. So what would override that, for her?

My thought is that she’d tell them if she thought it was posing an immediate threat to the rest of the party, although I think she would try to pressure him into telling them first. I also think that if he left the group, she might tell them out of bitterness. 

We might find out the answer tomorrow, but for now, what do you think?

reblog.comment:

summary: GOD I am just SO excited for the “okay, no more secrets, we all need to know what is going on right now” conversation that I can...
body: GOD I am just SO excited for the “okay, no more secrets, we all need to know what is going on right now” conversation that I can just feel coming in the first half of tomorrow’s episode like yes!!!!! everyone hearing caleb’s backstory!!!! everyone hearing NOTT’S backstory!!!!! everyone rallying together to FIGURE THIS SHIT OUT!!!! i am READY for it!

body:

Me: huh, looks interesting I guess
Me: oh hey it's Liam O'Brien
Me: playing... an old man who trains youth to be spies and criminals for an evil organization, brainwashing as necessary
Me: ... interesting

title: Oh no, horrible thought incoming [SPOILERS]:
body: What if Caleb never killed his parents… Trent just modified his memory to make him think he did and it drove him insane to the point of fulfilling Trent’s desires to master Dunamancy without Trent having to lift a finger.

summary: 7 + 61 and Widomauk for the fic trope thing *pornstarsmirk. sticker*
question: 7 + 61 and Widomauk for the fic trope thing *pornstarsmirk. sticker*
answer:
OMG you gave me two gems tbh sakdjask I love this kind of tropes *rub hands*

(sorry for the late reply sigh…)

—

Molly obioviously is the florist in this scenario and works with Yasha in a flower shop. He’s not that good in making bouquets and things, but you know, he’s charming and people enjoy talking with him while Yasha prepares their orders.

Everything goes alright until a blue tiefling starts coming in their shop with a messy ginger who wears a mildly stinky coat and a sad smile on his face. Jester, the blue tiefling, is way too talkative, she loves flowers though, so Yasha likes her, and the hobo guy is mostly silent, he looks around the shop curiously but he does nothing more than that and Molly is immediately drawn to him because hey he’s cute and he has something in his sky blue eyes that makes his heart clench in his chest. Oddly, Molly doesn’t know how to approach the guy, he looks out of place and he’s sure he’s there only because of his friend.

Some days later, the two come back to Yasha and Molly’s shop after that first time and Molly still doesn’t know what to say to Hobo Guy. Since when did he become so shy? Then, as Molly is playing with his tarot cards, Hobo Guys picks a vase of flowers and comes closer to the cashier. AND SPEAKS. And… oh. He has a sexy voice, too. Fuck. Molly is really fucked. Hobo Guy speaks to him and he can’t think straight (rofl), but fortunately Yasha is there to rescue the Disaster Tiefling™. Jester and Hobo Guy - whose name is Caleb, Molly will find out later that day from Yasha - pay and exit.

Jester and Hobo Guy continue to visit the shop once or twice a week for a while, Yasha is happy because she can talk with the tiefling about flowers and their proprieties, and Molly can spy his new crush from behind the counter. He looks like a lovesick, chin on his palm and elbow on the counter staring at Hobo Guy with heart eyes. He can’t help it, and he thinks that Jester has noticed it but whatever. Every time Caleb buys a different vase of flowers.

One day, when the two are paying, Molly hands the bag to Hobo Guy, their eyes meet and he winks at him. Caleb blinks and blushes - BLUSHES - and Molly’s smile even widens, while his heart beats like a hammer in his ribcage. He tells him to come back - as if he doesn’t know already that he will - and Hobo Guy stammers something under his breath before being dragged by Jester out of the shop. Molly will think about that for days. 

It’s been two months now, and Molly really wants to impress Caleb, so he asks Yasha to teach him about the language of flowers. 

Next time Hobo Guy comes to the shop he’s not with Jester, but with a little green goblin and she starts strolling around the shop at Yasha’s side because she wants to see all the flowers they have there. As usual, Caleb stands next to the counter as he follows his friend, Nott, with the gaze. Molly is waiting for the perfect time to give him what he has prepared for him, and he sweats, because even if he’s always ready to make a fool of himself, he doesn’t want to fuck up his only opportunity with the guy since he seems so shy. 

When Yasha and Nott have finished the tour, the goblin sees a beautiful bouquette behind the counter and asks if it’s on sale. And Molly, poor boy, feels his cheeks on fire when he says “no, it’s not. It’s for someone special”. And. Caleb. BITCH. Caleb looks..disappointed WTF??? The little smile he’s had on his face svanishes in a second and Molly panics so much that he literally throws the bouquet in Caleb’s arms who looks at him with wide eyes and Molly says “I hope you like it.” trying to be nonchalant and failing miserably because he mumbles - blame his bi ass for that. Caleb’s eyes are blue as ever and he smirks, s m i r k s, and the Disaster Tiefling™ almost has an aneurysm AKSJAKSJK

In the bouquet there’s a piece of paper where Molly has written his phone number and a little smiling tiefling emoji. And Caleb will text him later that day after Nott and Jester have prayed him to do so because SPOILER ALERT Caleb is smitten too, but he was too socially awkward to ask Molly for a date ;))

The flowers Molly has chose for the bouquette are pink and white camellias, gardenias and calla lilies.

—

Idk so much about flowers meaning tbh kjaksdak IF I’ll write a fic based on this post, I should learn more AHAHAHA

send me tropes!

OMG you gave me two gems tbh sakdjask I love this kind of tropes *rub hands*

Jester, the blue tiefling, is way too talkative, she loves flowers though, so Yasha likes her, and the hobo guy is mostly silent, he looks around the shop curiously but he does nothing more than that and Molly is immediately drawn to him because hey he’s cute and he has something in his sky blue eyes that makes his heart clench in his chest. Oddly, Molly doesn’t know how to approach the guy, he looks out of place and he’s sure he’s there only because of his friend.

Some days later, the two come back to Yasha and Molly’s shop after that first time and Molly still doesn’t know what to say to Hobo Guy. Since when did he become so shy? Then, as Molly is playing with his tarot cards, Hobo Guys picks a vase of flowers and comes closer to the cashier. AND SPEAKS. And… oh. He has a sexy voice, too. Fuck. Molly is really fucked. Hobo Guy speaks to him and he can’t think straight (rofl), but fortunately Yasha is there to rescue the Disaster Tiefling™. Jester and Hobo Guy - whose name is Caleb, Molly will find out later that day from Yasha - pay and exit.

Jester and Hobo Guy continue to visit the shop once or twice a week for a while, Yasha is happy because she can talk with the tiefling about flowers and their proprieties, and Molly can spy his new crush from behind the counter. He looks like a lovesick, chin on his palm and elbow on the counter staring at Hobo Guy with heart eyes. He can’t help it, and he thinks that Jester has noticed it but whatever. Every time Caleb buys a different vase of flowers.

One day, when the two are paying, Molly hands the bag to Hobo Guy, their eyes meet and he winks at him. Caleb blinks and blushes - BLUSHES - and Molly’s smile even widens, while his heart beats like a hammer in his ribcage. He tells him to come back - as if he doesn’t know already that he will - and Hobo Guy stammers something under his breath before being dragged by Jester out of the shop. Molly will think about that for days. 

It’s been two months now, and Molly really wants to impress Caleb, so he asks Yasha to teach him about the language of flowers. 

Next time Hobo Guy comes to the shop he’s not with Jester, but with a little green goblin and she starts strolling around the shop at Yasha’s side because she wants to see all the flowers they have there. As usual, Caleb stands next to the counter as he follows his friend, Nott, with the gaze. Molly is waiting for the perfect time to give him what he has prepared for him, and he sweats, because even if he’s always ready to make a fool of himself, he doesn’t want to fuck up his only opportunity with the guy since he seems so shy. 

When Yasha and Nott have finished the tour, the goblin sees a beautiful bouquette behind the counter and asks if it’s on sale. And Molly, poor boy, feels his cheeks on fire when he says “no, it’s not. It’s for someone special”. And. Caleb. BITCH. Caleb looks..disappointed WTF??? The little smile he’s had on his face svanishes in a second and Molly panics so much that he literally throws the bouquet in Caleb’s arms who looks at him with wide eyes and Molly says “I hope you like it.” trying to be nonchalant and failing miserably because he mumbles - blame his bi ass for that. Caleb’s eyes are blue as ever and he smirks, s m i r k s, and the Disaster Tiefling™ almost has an aneurysm AKSJAKSJK

In the bouquet there’s a piece of paper where Molly has written his phone number and a little smiling tiefling emoji. And Caleb will text him later that day after Nott and Jester have prayed him to do so because SPOILER ALERT Caleb is smitten too, but he was too socially awkward to ask Molly for a date ;))

The flowers Molly has chose for the bouquette are pink and white camellias, gardenias and calla lilies.

—

Idk so much about flowers meaning tbh kjaksdak IF I’ll write a fic based on this post, I should learn more AHAHAHA

send me tropes!
